Key: Man it's pretty late.

I didn't expect to get caught up in a study
session... I sure had some bad luck today.

I feel more tired than usual. But knowing that
she'll be waiting for me at home...
Hehe, I feel a little bit better.
I'm home.

...Huh? Is she not home yet? Normally she'd be
here before me.
Hi. Welcome home!
I'm home, Kotori.
Grr...
Huh...? I'm home, Kotori-san?
...No. Try again.
Huh? Wh-What do you mean?
The usual...

You need to call me by the usual, or I won't
accept it.
*Grunt*... Okay, fine.
I-I'm home, Honey.
Welcome home, darling ♪
(*Grunt*... I don't think I can do it.)

Kotori, I can't do it. Let's call each other by
our normal names.
Aww. Gosh. You're so whiny, Shido. Fine...
Welcome home, Shido. My husband... Tee-hee♪
I'm home, Kotori.

(It's been a month since Kotori and I got married.
We're still newlyweds, but it seems like our
married life is going well.)

Kotori attends school while also being a
housewife. She somehow makes it work
so well...

What are you mumbling about, Shido? Why don't you
start by taking your shoes off? Here, I'll take
your bag.
Oh... Thanks, Kotori.

Of course, I'm your partner. Oh... I know!
Hey, Shido.
Hm? What's the matter?

You want to eat first?
You want to take a bath first?
Or...

What?! Wh-What are you saying, Kotori?! Are you
crazy?
Huh...? Oh, you want me?
What?!

Just kidding. I'm still working on your bath and
I'm in the middle of making dinner. So hang on
a bit longer.
Huh...?

Oh, would it have been better if it weren't a
joke?

No, no, no! It's fine! Just go back to the
kitchen. I'll go change and wait.

Okaaay. I put a change of clothes on the bed
for you.

Got it. Jeez, she's starting to say all these
mature things.

I wonder what she would have said if I had said...
I wanted her?
WHOA! What am I thinking of?!

Okay, I've changed, but I wonder what Kotori's
making.

Oh, sorry. It's going to be a bit longer, so why
don't you wait and watch TV?
O-Okay.
Hm... I don't know how to put it...
Huh...? What's the matter, Shido?
No, I guess I'm getting emotional.
About what?

It's nice to see your wife making dinner for you
in the kitchen.

Y-You idiot. What are you talking about, get out
of my way! I'm getting plates.

Why can't I watch you, Kotori? You're my wife,
after all.

Aww, gosh! Do what you want, then! You're so
weird, Shido...
Oh, sorry. Are you mad, Kotori?
No. I'm just blushing...
Huh?

I'm just saying I'm about to go crazy because it
makes me happy that you're watching me. Anyways...
I'm going to do even better with cooking now.
O-Okay...!

(Ever since we got married, Kotori's aura has
changed... Or I guess she's more honest about her
feelings. She emanates an aura of love for me.)

Damn it. It's been a while since I've been hit by
such a strong blow. It's powerful...

Gosh, it's your fault you're saying all these
things. Anyways, if you're going to just stand
there, why don't you taste-test?
Got it.
Here you go.
Oh, today is beef stew? Hm...

Ah... delicious! You've gotten even better,
Kotori.
Really?!

Yeah. What's the point in lying? The flavoring's
just how I like it.

I feel like your cooking's gotten better than
mine.
Y-You think so? Tee-hee.

You can cook, do laundry, everything. Man, you're
the ideal bride.

(But... I guess it'd be an issue if the neighbors
found out we were married. It helps that we've
always been living under the same roof...)

...Is it okay if you're my only wife for a little
while?

What are you talking about, Shido? You're starting
to grin.
Oops, was it that obvious?
I-It's nothing, Kotori.
Hmm. I see. Is that soooo...
Wh-What is it? I was only thinking about you.

About me? Oh... I know. You were thinking of
something perverted, weren't you? We're not
doing that yet.

No, no, no, no! I wasn't thinking about that
at all...
Oh, is that so, Shido...?

(I-It's coming. She's going to say something like,
You're gross!" or "You insect!" or something to

W-We're going to save all that until we're both
adults.
AH!

Hehe. Ahh, look at you. Anyways, dinner's almost
ready, so hold on a little longer, okay?

Jeez, what a mischievous little sister... Well,
she's my wife now, huh? Man, she sure is a
mischievous young wife.
(...Calling her a young wife sounds bad.)

(But anyways, this is so nice. Just seeing Kotori
cooking for me makes me feel warm on the inside.)
Is this what you call happiness?
...What am I talking about?
Hm-hmmmm ♪
But man...

That you're not such a troublemaker anymore makes
me feel a bit lonely. I feel kind of lost...
Kotori! How much longer?
Kotori-saaaan?
Hmm, she seems to be focused on cooking.
(I know!)
I'll help Kotori.
I'll play a trick on her.

All right. I feel bad just watching,
so I'll help her.
Kotori!
Huh? What is it, Shido?
I'll help, too. Can I do anything?
Really? But I'm mostly done with the cooking part.
Can you help me set the table?
Got it.
Kotori, how many plates do you want?

Hmm... Two bowls. Oh, and one big plate, three
small plates... I think that's enough.

Oh, that's a lot... Oh yeah, we have stew. Makes
sense. I'm going to pass behind you, okay?
Owwww.
S-Sorry, I bumped into you.

No, me too... This place is too narrow for two
people to walk around, huh?
I'll come around the side, then.
Got it. Then I'm passing by... Ouch!
Ow!
Wh-Why are you passing on the same side!
Well, I need to go this way to get the plates.
Huh... Oh yeah, huh.

Anyways, let me get through here... Now we're
good, Kotori.
Sorry, Shido.

(Crap, this isn't good. Clearly this is symbolic
of reality. We've become a married couple,
but we're not able to understand each other yet.)
...This is an obstacle to overcome.

(All right. When I come back the other way, I will
match Kotori's moves. Read Kotori's moves... I
should be able to do that if I'm her husband!)

(...I've gotten the plates. Now's the right time
to pass.)

(Kotori's stirring the pot now. When she moves on
to the pot next to her, I'll pass by... That'd be
best.)

(...Not yet, not yet. Don't rush it. I just want
to carry the plate over.)
...Perfect ♪
(...Now's my chance!)
Oh, I need to stop the water.
What?! A feint―?!
Crap...! The plate!
Huh? Oh, oh...!
...Ouch. I was able to protect the plate.
Kotori. Are you okay? Huh... Kotori?
...Kyuuu.
Kotori!
I'm so sorry.
I wanted to help, but I just got in the way...

And I almost got you hurt. And the meal got
burned... *sigh*...
Okay, stop right there!
Kotori?

It's fine. I'm not worried about it. I know you
weren't trying to get in the way, so I'm not mad.

When you wanted to help, that made me really
happy. So it's all good. That's all I need.
Kotori...
You'll help me again, right Onii-chan?

(It's been a while since she's called me that, and
my heart just jumped. This is so damaging...
seriously.)
Tee-hee. Okay, let's eat.
Got it!

(I know. I'll play a trick on her. I mean, a wife
in an apron obviously means I'd play around
with her. I'm sure Kotori wants it too!)

(...I know that's dumb reasoning, but I'm still
going to go through with it. My soul is lit with
an inextinguishable flame!)
I guess I'll watch her from behind.
...Hmm-hmmm ♪

You look like you're having so much fun cooking
for me, Kotori.
...I'm starting to feel guilty now.

But I've made up my mind already. I'm going to go
for it.
...Hmm-hmmm♪
...I'll start by touching her.
AH! Wh-Wh-Wh-What are you doing?!
Well, there was a piece of string on your back.
Oh really? Th-Thank you. But be careful, okay?

(Hehehe. She fell for it. There was no string! I'm
still continuing, Kotori!)
...Yah!
KYAH!
Wh-What now?!
Oh, I thought I saw an insect.
An insect?! D-Did you get it?

Sorry, not yet. Don't move, okay Kotori?
I'll get it now.
O-Okay. Hurry up.
Yah.
KYAHH!
Hah!
N-No!
Like this!
M-Mmm!

Sh-Shido. You're doing this on purpose,
aren't you?
Hahaha of course. Good job, Kotori.
C-Cut it out. I'm busy cooki―Ah...

But just a little more... I want to be close to
you like this.

Gosh... You're being so affectionate. D-Do I look
that attractive in an apron?

Yeah, you do. You're so adorable, it's driving me
crazy.

Kotori, you're adorable. The cutest girl in the
world, and my wife... Only mine.
Aw... Shido...
Kotori...
Hm... Something...
Something smells like it's burning...
Ah! The meat!
T-Turn down the burner.
B-But get away from me first!

(In the end, the dish got a little burned. Kotori
was mad at first, but forgave me eventually.)

It was supposed to be a normal meal, but it ended
up being a big deal.

(After all that happened, the dinner table was
finally full of the dishes she prepared.)

Mmm. It looks really delicious.
I'm digging right in!
Go on ahead. So... how is it?

Yeah. It's super good. I have no issues with any
of it, it's perfect.
Y-Yeah? I'm so glad.
Oh, but the meat is a bit charred.
Oh, sorry about that...

(That wasn't Kotori's fault, but mine 100%.
I'm going to eat it all.)
Kotori. I'll eat all the burnt ones.
But...

Mm. It's not that bad. It's still really
delicious.
Thanks, Shido.
Oh, I know...!
What is it?

H-Here. I'll feed you, so you'd better be
thankful.
A-Ahh...?

(Ah. I didn't even know such a lovely event was
waiting for me! I must respond, or I can't call
myself a man.)
A-Ah... *nom*...
How is it? Good?

(The situation got me blushing, and Kotori's
peering at me so closely, I can barely taste
the food. But I know...)

Yeah, it's delicious. The fact that you're feeding
me makes it that much more delicious.

Hehe. You're welcome. Shido... I love you, my dear
husband.
(Ah, my wife is the cutest in the world.)
